name: Bunny Cable Square
description: This sweet Bunny Cable Knit Stitch Pattern brings out the most adorable little bunny rabbit shape, perfect for your Easter and Springtime knitting! The twisted cables create the backside of an adorable bunny, complete with bobble tail. The Bunny Cable itself is simply 8 stitches in the middle of a knitted square shape. You can get really creative with this pattern, easily knitting up blankets, scarves, and pillows.
full_text: This sweet Bunny Cable Knit Stitch Pattern brings out the most adorable little bunny rabbit shape, perfect for your Easter and Springtime knitting! The twisted cables create the backside of an adorable bunny, complete with bobble tail. The Bunny Cable itself is simply 8 stitches in the middle of a knitted square shape. You can get really creative with this pattern, easily knitting up blankets, scarves, and pillows. • Yarn in any weight, fiber, & color of your choice • Knitting Needles, sized appropriately for your yarn • Cable Needle • Scissors • Tapestry Needle This sample was created with size 11 US knitting needles and bulky weight yarn. The Bunny Cable itself is simply 8 stitches in the middle of this knitted square shape. My color-coded knitting pattern system allows you to read the pattern easily. Hope it helps!
